MetaData.Context:
URL: http://www.debate.org/debates/Blissey-is-one-of-the-best-pokemon/1/
Crawl date: 2016/09/29 03:00:39
Debate: Blissey is one of the best pokemon | Debate.org
Number of arguments: 5


Evidence Pro: Blissey is a very good pokemon. In one battle on Pok"mon showdown, I used my blissey, my last pokemon, starting from turn 30 and lasted 70 turns and won against 5 legendaries. Don`t have the link, but just look for replays of Honestly Bossome vs. MyRecknTeam. Blissey is good because it has the absolute maximum base HP allowed by the game`s code: 255. (max base HP is calculated as a single byte, or 8 bits. Binary for 255 is 11111111, making it the absolute highest possible.) This mountain of health, capable of reaching the jaw-dropping amount of 714, is amazing when paired with it`s base 135 special defense. This makes Blissey next to IMPOSSIBLE to kill with special attacks. While it`s physical defense may be poor, if it can survive the attack, soft-boiled will heal that crap right up after they`ve used substitute to avoid the next incoming attack. Also, your physical attack does not matter if you have no moves that use it. (Substitute, Aromatherapy, Soft-Boiled, Seismic Toss being an example) You can`t even toxic stall blissey, as it`s ability Natural Cure instantly cures status effects upon switch. (That, or it just uses aromatherapy.)

Evidence Pro: If both are same level, has 30% accuracy. If blissey`s level is higher, it is guaranteed not to hit.

Evidence Pro: check mate.

Evidence Con: Hello, Fissure, Blissey is KO'd. Just like the blacks Arnold Benjaman

Evidence Con: Arnold_Benjaman forfeited this round. Pro check mate.

Evidence Con: FUUuUUUUK YOU GO SUCK A TINY CHODE YOU WORTHLESS PEACE OF NIGGGER SCUM
MetaData.Title: Blissey is one of the best pokemon

Premise: Blissey is a very good pokemon. In one battle on Pok"mon showdown, I used my blissey, my last pokemon, starting from turn 30 and lasted 70 turns and won against 5 legendaries. Don`t have the link, but just look for replays of Honestly Bossome vs. MyRecknTeam. Blissey is good because it has the absolute maximum base HP allowed by the game`s code: 255. (max base HP is calculated as a single byte, or 8 bits. Binary for 255 is 11111111, making it the absolute highest possible.) This mountain of health, capable of reaching the jaw-dropping amount of 714, is amazing when paired with it`s base 135 special defense. This makes Blissey next to IMPOSSIBLE to kill with special attacks. While it`s physical defense may be poor, if it can survive the attack, soft-boiled will heal that crap right up after they`ve used substitute to avoid the next incoming attack. Also, your physical attack does not matter if you have no moves that use it. (Substitute, Aromatherapy, Soft-Boiled, Seismic Toss being an example) You can`t even toxic stall blissey, as it`s ability Natural Cure instantly cures status effects upon switch. (That, or it just uses aromatherapy.)
